column4: now if i can only find out >> how do i *change* the number of lines that terminal remembers <> like when i scroll up it only remembers x of lines of text so if the program (wine) outputs lots of text, i can only read half of it
try storing your command with $~  command >logfile.log
so i should be able to   !$  wine c:\\program\ files\\e-sword\\e_sword > logfile.log   ??
mmm it seems it did not create logfile.log
if the log doesn't show anything, try command 2> logfile
